table.name: ACFilterList
table.description: Represents the map of filterlist name and filterlist ID.

column.name: LISTID
column.description: Auto-generated Unique ID

column.name: LISTNAME
column.description: Unique name to identify the filterlist

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: Description of the filter list

column.name: NAME_NO
column.description: Unique name which identifies the Element to be used for form element creation.

column.name: NAME
column.description: Unique name which identifies the Element to be used for form element creation.

column.name: UICREATOR
column.description: Specifies the class file to be used for creating the formelement indicated by the NAME attribute. The class should be an implementation of the UICreator interface.

column.name: VALIDATIONMETHOD
column.description: Specifies the validation method, if any, to be used for this particular element during form validation. The form element value and the formelement object will be passed as arguments.

column.name: ALERTMESSAGE
column.description: Specifies the message to be displayed when the validation for this element fails. Works only when the VALIDATIONMETHOD is configured. The implementation is like follows. If the return type is boolean, then in case of failure the message specified will be used. If the return type is String, then in case of failure, the returned string itself will be used as the alert message.

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Specifies the type of element. i.e, Select / Input / Radio etc...

table.name: ACNavigationConfiguration
table.description: Holds the pagination properties for a table-view where the page length can be configured using {@link ACPAGELENGTHCONFIG}.

column.name: NAME_NO
column.description: Unique ID of the Navigation configuration

column.name: NAME
column.description: Name by which this configuration is referred

column.name: NAVIGATIONTYPE
column.description: Type of Navigation to be used for constructing the navigation component with NORMAL being the default.

column.name: NOCOUNT
column.description: If true, then the count will not be fetched. Default: false

column.name: ORIENTATION
column.description: Indicates the position for the navigation component. The possible values are TOP(at the top of the table), BOTTOM(at the bottom of the table) and BOTH(at both top and bottom of the table).

column.name: TEMPLATENAME
column.description: Client side rendering template name for the specific navigation component

table.name: ACColumnConfigurationList
table.description: Represents a list of column configurations defined in {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATION}

column.name: NAME_NO
column.description: Auto-generated unique number to represent this list

column.name: NAME
column.description: Unique name to identify this list for a table/form/propertysheet view.

column.name: NAME_NO
column.description: Unique name used to identify the group of layout configuration details for a view.

column.name: NAME
column.description: Unique name used to identify the group of layout configuration details for a view.

table.name: EmptyTableMessage
table.description: Contains the configurable message that can be displayed when there is no data to display. It can be configured for a specific table-view or on application of a filter.

column.name: EMPTY_MESSAGE_ID
column.description: Auto-generated Unique ID

column.name: ICON_URL
column.description: Relative URL path of icon to be displayed with the message.

column.name: TITLE_TEXT
column.description: Header Text for the message .

column.name: MESSAGE_TEXT
column.description: Body of the message

column.name: MENU_ID
column.description: Refers to the 'MENUID_NO' in the {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.MENU} to be displayed with the message.

table.name: ACTableViewConfig
table.description: Contains configurable attributes of a table-view

column.name: NAME
column.description: Refers to name of the view defined in {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.VIEWCONFIGURATION}

column.name: CVNAME
column.description: ID of the CUSTOMVIEWCONFIGURATION to fetch data for this table-view

column.name: NAVIGATIONCONFIG
column.description: Name of the {@link ACNAVIGATIONCONFIGURATION} used for constructing the navigation component

column.name: COLUMNCONFIGLIST
column.description: Name of the {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATIONLIST}

column.name: PSCONFIGLIST
column.description: Name of the {@link ACPSCONFIGLIST} for this table

column.name: EMPTY_TABLE_MESSAGE
column.description: Customizable message when no rows are present in the table-view

column.name: DISPLAYTYPE
column.description: Way to display a table-view. Columns of a row can be displayed horizontally/vertically or like a Property Sheet(shown as Property-value pair). Default: Horizontal

column.name: COLUMNCHOOSERMENUITEM
column.description: Specifies the MenuItem for invoking the column-chooser for the view

column.name: ENABLEROWSELECTION
column.description: Specifies whether the row selection should be enabled or not. Available types are CHECKBOX / RADIO. Use NONE to disable this feature. Default: CHECKBOX

column.name: RENDERMENU
column.description: Indicates whether to render the menu associated with the view. Default: false

column.name: DATASOURCENAME
column.description: Name of the external datasource,if the data is to be retrieved from another database

column.name: PAGELENGTH
column.description: Number of records to be fetched and displayed by default.

column.name: SORTCOLUMN
column.description: Alias of the column by which the data should be sorted by default.

column.name: SORTORDER
column.description: Order by which the column should be sorted by default.

column.name: ENABLEROWHOVER
column.description: Indicates whether a row should be highlighted or not on hover. Default: false

column.name: ENABLEEXPORT
column.description: If true, table data can be exported in PDF, CSV, XLSX and JSON format. Default: false

column.name: DISPLAYHEADER
column.description: Indicates whether the header of the table is to be displayed. Default: true

column.name: CUSTOMTABLEMODELRENDERER
HLSEARCH
column.description: Indicates whether to highlight the spot searched data for all the search enabled columns. Default: false

column.name: ISADVANCEDSEARCH
column.description: Indicates whether to display the allowed values for search as a drop down list for each search enabled column, based on its data type. Default: false

column.name: SHOWNAVIG
column.description: If true, hides the header and navigation part if no rows found in table. Default: false

column.name: ROWTRANSFORMER
ISSCROLLENABLED
column.description: Indicates whether the table is scroll-table(next set of records is fetched on scrolling) or not

column.name: INITIALFETCHEDROWS
column.description: Rows fetched by first request in dynamic table. Default: -1

column.name: TEMPLATEVIEWNAME
column.description: The Name given as a parameter value to 'viewname' in the template files, which are used to render the view.

column.name: EMPTY_MESSAGE_ID
column.description: Indicates the ID of the Empty Message defined in {@link EMPTYTABLEMESSAGE}

table.name: ACTableFilterListRel
table.description: Manages the filterlist and the configurations of custom filter(s) for a view.

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'VIEWNAME' in {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.VIEWCONFIGURATION} table

column.name: FILTERLISTID
column.description: Refers to the 'LISTNAME' in {@link ACFILTERLIST} table

column.name: DEFAULTFILTERNAME
column.description: Name of the Filter(present in the filter list and defined in {@link ACFILTER}) to be applied to the given view by default

column.name: FILTERCONFIGLISTNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' in {@link ACFILTERCONFIGLIST} table

column.name: ISCUSTOMFILTER
column.description: If false, filter cannot be created at runtime. If true, user can create their own filter on demand. Default: false

column.name: FILTERUITYPE
column.description: It refers to the customized filter UI provided by the client. If LEFT, filters will be displayed as links without the table view with which this filter is associated . If CENTER, filters will not be displayed. If NORMAL, both will be displayed. Default: NORMAL

column.name: LINKEDVIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the viewname coupled for which this filter has to be applied, if FILTERUITYPE is LEFT.

table.name: ACTableColumns
table.description: It stores the properties of modified columns of a personalized view. It overrides the values given in ACColumnConfiguration

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'VIEWNAME_NO' of the view in {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.VIEWCONFIGURATION} table

column.name: COLUMNINDEX
column.description: Position by which the column is ordered in the personalized view.

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Refers to the 'COLUMNALIAS' given in {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATION} table

column.name: DISPLAYNAME
column.description: Name displayed as the Column Header.

column.name: VISIBLE
column.description: If true, the column is shown in the view. Default: true

column.name: WIDTH
column.description: Indicates the width of the each column. Intention is to support the Resizable columns in the mickey client

column.name: REDACT_TYPE
column.description: Indicates the masking type incase if it is Personally Identifiable Information(PII) column. Default value : NULL

table.name: ACCriteria

column.name: CRITERIAID
column.description: Auto generated Unique ID for a criteria

column.name: LOGICALREPRESENTATION
column.description: For a single entry, refers to the 'RELATIONALCRITERIAID' in {@link ACRELATIONALCRITERIA}. For multiple entries, their logical relation, enclosed in paranthesis, can be given as, Syntax: (RelationalCriteria_1 | RelationalCriteria_2 & ...... & RelationalCriteria_N)

table.name: ACRelationalCriteria
table.description: It represents the condition for the given column

column.name: CRITERIAID
column.description: Refers to the 'CRITERIAID' in {@link ACCRITERIA}

column.name: RELATIONALCRITERIAID
column.description: Unique ID for the ACCRelationalCriteria

column.name: TABLEALIAS
column.description: Name(not alias) of the table involved

column.name: COLUMNNAME
column.description: Name of the column

column.name: COMPARATOR
column.description: Numerical representation of the comparator(e.g. 1 for not-equal). Refer QUERYCONSTANTS table

column.name: VALUE
column.description: Value being compared with the given column

column.name: CASESENSITIVE
column.description: Whether value comparison is case sensitive. Default: true.

foreign-key.name: ACRel_Criteria_FK
foreign-key.description: Foreign key to refer the table ACCriteria

table.name: ACPageLengthConfig
table.description: Holds the page length(no. of records per page) for Navigation Component.

column.name: NAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' in the {@link ACNAVIGATIONCONFIGURATION} table

column.name: PAGELENGTH
column.description: Page length for the Navigation Configuration

table.name: ACColumnConfiguration
table.description: Contains column-level configurable features and attributes. It also provides the configurations for transforming column data.

column.name: CONFIGNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' of the {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATIONLIST} table

column.name: COLUMNINDEX
column.description: Position of the column in the view

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Refers to the 'COLUMNALIAS' of the SELECTCOLUMN table; if not present in the SELECTCOLUMN table then it's a dummy column.

column.name: DISPLAYNAME
column.description: Name displayed as the Column Header.

column.name: VISIBLE
column.description: If true, the column is shown in the view, otherwise hidden. Default: true

column.name: SORTENABLED
column.description: Indicates whether the column can be sorted or not. Default: true

column.name: TRANSFORMER
column.description: Fully qualified name of the transformer class for transforming the data before rendering. It must be a child of {@link com.adventnet.client.components.table.web.ColumnTransformer}. Default: {@link com.adventnet.client.components.table.web.DefaultTransformer}

column.name: ACTIONNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'MENUITEMID' of the {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.MENUITEM} table.

column.name: SEARCHENABLED
column.description: To enable/disable search for the column. Default: false

column.name: CREATORCONFIG
column.description: Specifies the creator configuration name for generating the cell content.

column.name: DEFAULT_TEXT
column.description: Text to display when the column value is null.

column.name: DATE_FORMAT
column.description: Format to display date/time values.

column.name: TRIM_LENGTH
column.description: If length of column value exceeds the given value, message from {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATION#TRIM_MSG_LINK} is displayed.

column.name: TRIM_MSG_LINK
column.description: Javascript function which displays the actual value whose length is beyond TRIM_LENGTH. User can specify their own method. Some samples are defaultTrimmedMessageDisplayer, showTrimmedMessageOnImageClick, showTrimmedMessageOnMouseOver, showMessageOnTextMouseOver. For more info, refer TableHandling.js doc.

column.name: PREFIX_TEXT
column.description: Both dynamic/static text can be prefixed to the column value. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table whose column value is taken. Static: Given value is taken.

column.name: SUFFIX_TEXT
column.description: Both dynamic/static text can be suffixed to the column value. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table whose column value is taken. Static: Given value is taken.

column.name: SUFFIX_ICON
column.description: Icon can be suffixed to the column value dynamically/statically. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table from where icon path is taken. Static: Given path of icon is taken.

column.name: ICON
column.description: Icon can be prefixed to the column value dynamically/statically. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table from where icon path is taken. Static: Given path of icon is taken.

column.name: TABLEALIAS
column.description: Alias of the table in which dynamic column is created.

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Name of the view invoked and rendered from the column.

column.name: STATIC_TEXT
column.description: Text that is internationalized and displayed in the column, irrespective of the column value.

column.name: ISNULLABLE
column.description: Specifies whether the column can be nullable or not. For example, it is used to determine whether the column is mandatory or not in ACForm component.

column.name: CSSCLASS
column.description: CSS class for the column.

column.name: MENUID
column.description: MENUID of {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.MENU} whose menu-items are displayed to perform various actions on the selected row.

column.name: ISHEADERVISIBLE
column.description: If true, the column header is displayed, or else an empty header is shown. Default: true

column.name: AUTOLINK
column.description: If true, the column value is featured as a link. Default: false

column.name: REPLACE_TEXT
column.description: Given value replaces the column value. Input format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN.COLUMNALIAS whose value replaces the actual column value.

column.name: REPLACE_ICON
column.description: Given icon replaces the column value. Input format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN.COLUMNALIAS whose value(icon path) replaces the actual column value.

column.name: HEADERCSS
column.description: CSS class for column header.

column.name: ACTIONINVOKINGSTYLE
column.description: The way action is invoked on column values

column.name: ROLENAME
column.description: Authorization role assigned to the column

column.name: COLUMN_TYPE
column.description: DataType of the column. For example, it assists in Search and Validation.

column.name: ISDYNAMIC
column.description: Indicates whether it is a custom column or not. Default: false

column.name: PREFIX_LINK
column.description: Link can be prefixed to the column value dynamically/statically. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table whose column value is displayed as a link. Static: Given value is displayed as link.

column.name: SUFFIX_LINK
column.description: Link can be suffixed to the column value dynamically/statically. Dynamic: Value format is "_$COLUMNALIAS" , where COLUMNALIAS refers to SELECTCOLUMN Table whose column value is displayed as a link. Static: Given value is displayed as link.

column.name: WIDTH
column.description: Initial width of the column which can be resized dynamically.

column.name: ISEXPORTABLE
column.description: If false, the column is not considered for export. Default: true

column.name: ISCHOOSABLE
column.description: If false, the column is not available in the column chooser menu. It is always visible in the view. Default: true

column.name: PROPERTIES
column.description: Additional Data(JSON format) to be appended with column configuration(JSON Format). Eg. {"KEY":"VALUE"}

table.name: ACGroupByColumns
table.description: Maintains the columns which participate in GROUPBY clause of a query. [Note: Applicable for ACTable Component only]

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' in {@link ACTABLEVIEWCONFIG} table

column.name: TABLEALIAS
column.description: Name of the table whose column is used to group by

column.name: COLUMNNAME
column.description: Name of the column to be used for grouping

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Alias of the column to be used for grouping

table.name: ACFunctionColumns
table.description: Maintains the column details and the function name needed for aggregation. [Note: Applicable for ACTable Component only]

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' in {@link ACTABLEVIEWCONFIG} table

column.name: TABLEALIAS
column.description: Name of the table whose column participate in aggregation

column.name: COLUMNNAME
column.description: Name of the column to which the aggregate function is applied

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Alias of the column to which the aggregate function is applied

column.name: FUNCTIONNAME
column.description: Name of the aggregate function to be applied for the given column

table.name: ACRendererConfiguration
table.description: It contains the rendering attribute(s) needed for ColumnTransformer

column.name: CONFIGNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' of the {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATIONLIST} table.

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Refers to the 'COLUMNALIAS' of the {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATION} table.

column.name: PROPERTYNAME
column.description: Name of the property given to the transformer.

column.name: PROPERTYVALUE
column.description: Value of the property.

table.name: ACLinkParams
table.description: It contains details of parameters like name, index, value and scope for the given column menu-item.

column.name: CONFIGNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'NAME' in {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATIONLIST} table

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Refers to the 'COLUMNALIAS' in {@link ACCOLUMNCONFIGURATION} table

column.name: NAME
column.description: Name of the parameter passed

column.name: PARAMINDEX
column.description: Order of the parameter, applicable only if the parameter has multiple values

column.name: VALUE
column.description: Value of the parameter specified if SCOPE is 'STATIC', or else value taken as per defined 'SCOPE'

column.name: SCOPE

table.name: DynamicColumnConfiguration
table.description: For ACSQL views, select-column properties of a dynamic column is maintained here

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Refers to the 'VIEWNAME_NO' of the table-view in {@link com.adventnet.clientframework.VIEWCONFIGURATION#VIEWNAME} table

column.name: TABLEALIAS
column.description: Alias of the table in which dynamic column is created.

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Indicates the Columnalias, as specified in SelectQuery

column.name: COLUMNNAME
column.description: Name of the dynamic column created

column.name: DYCOLUMNNAME
column.description: Auto-generated name by which it is internally referred.

table.name: PIIRedactConfig
table.description: Contains the masking information of a PII(Personally Identifiable Information) column. It can be used in export, to mask/conceal the user data.

column.name: VIEWNAME
column.description: Indicates the name of the view to be exported.

column.name: COLUMNALIAS
column.description: Indicates the ID of the user.

column.name: REDACT_TYPE
column.description: Indicates the masking type incase if it is Personally Identifiable Information column. Supported types are 'MASK', 'SHUFFLE', 'PREFIX_MASK', 'SUFFIX_MASK','SKIP', 'PHONE', 'EMAIL'. Default value : 'MASK'
